title: Pitch
subtitle: Have a friend in mind?
content:
##### Have a friend in mind?

Pitching is a super fun experience and gives you a chance to remind your friend all the things you love about them.  It gives you creative freedom to showcase, the best, the worse and funny of your friend, sister, brother or even parent.

Applications are quick and only require a 30 second video and a couple of bits of other information.

` <button class="flex-shrink-0 bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-700 border-blue-500 hover:border-blue-700 text-sm border-4 text-white py-1 px-2 rounded" onclick="window.location.href = 'https://airtable.com/shrsssOV8NnKex8Nb';">Apply for Melbourne</button>`
